link_desc:
zabbix-dump is a Linux bash script for backing up the Zabbix configuration data by saving MySQL or PostgreSQL database tables into a compressed file.

Tables holding configuration data will be fully backed up. For mass data tables (events, history, trends, ...) only the table schema is stored without any data (to keep the backup small).

zabbix-dump can connect to a local or remote databases.

A download link can be found at https://github.com/maxhq/zabbix-backup/blob/master/README.md.
author: Jens Berthold
